item.description:
Some Quotes From the Weight Loss Meet Up Page:

Public Invited to 1st Anniversary Celebration:
West Haven, Connecticut. Look At Me Now, a Wellness Center located at 487A Campbell Avenue,
will host their First Year Anniversary Celebration on Saturday, May 17th, 10 am to 9 pm.

West Haven Mayor John M. Picard will officiate at the ribbon cutting ceremony at 1:00 pm.

Live music from 7:00- 8:30 pm.

There is no fee to attend, and those attending may enter a drawing to win various prizes, including
Gift certificates, Swedish massage, and free weight loss services until you achieve your desired results.
End of Quote

http://weightloss.mee...

weightloss.meetup.com/463/calendar/7827564/

Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Loris store.

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony s Pizza Italian Restaurant

There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony s.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Lori s store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left. Loris store is a few stores in.

Please remember not to leave anything of value within view
Inside your vehicle that might attract some undesirables.

This should be a healthy and fun Meet Up.

Remember that while you are there that
you can also purchase a healthy smoothie and other items from
Glen, who runs Catch A Healthy Habit Caf√© in West Haven.

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

The Event starts at 10:00 am, but I have our Meet Up time at 12:30.
You can go there earlier than 12:30 if you want to.
I will try to be there at 1:00 for the Ribbon Cutting by the West Haven Mayor.
I might still be there an hour or so after the Ribbon Cutting to see what else
Is happening at the event.

Unknown Zone Members,

Remember that we have another Meet Up Event in Wallingford that the evening.

http://conspiracy.mee...

conspiracy.meetup.com/83/calendar/7704815/

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Lori Larsen a member of UZ is main POC at this Event. She is the Owner of the Business.
item.why: Who likes to attend festive One Year Anniversary Events.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Look At Me Now 1st Year Anniversary Celebration on May 17
